# Cleaning and Housekeeping Services - Sorel Coast Guard Base
## Tender Information
* Reference Number: PW-23-01030813
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 30003720
* Publication Date: 2023-03-24
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-18T13:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-04-05
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-05-31

## Tender Description
The Canadian Coast Guard Base in Sorel located in Quebec (excluding National Capital Region) requires the services of a contractor to provide daily, monthly, and annual housekeeping services. The base operates 24/7 and has a reception area (gatehouse), an administrative building, and workshops.

## Security Requirements
The contractor must ensure that all personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites hold a valid Reliability Status, granted or approved by the Central Security Practice (CSP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following agreements:
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information
- Name: Pascal Busungu
- Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
- Phone: 506-429-6269
